name: Rushing B
description:
A student races across FEUP's B Hall trying to get to class on time. On their way, they will face many different kinds of enemies and power-ups which will aid them in their journey.

Press the up arrow key to fly, the space key to shoot and ESC to pause the game. When in a boss fight, you can press c to activate a powerup. Collect as many coins and notebooks as possible!
